name: Scroll Ninja [Revised]
blurb: Scroll Ninja is a side scrolling action game with unique game-play based on real ninja tools in traditional Japanese art scroll style.

rewards.reward: Limited edition Scroll Ninja Wallpaper Sets for Desktop and Mobile.
Scroll Ninja Pocket Edition for Android + Wallpaper Sets.
Scroll Ninja *special* Pocket Edition for Android with special Kickstarter only abilities and tools and full access to development builds + Wallpaper Sets + Sound Track (no DRM!).
Scroll Ninja full for Desktop (Win, Mac, Linux) + Wallpaper Sets.
Scroll Ninja for Desktop *special* edition for Kickstarter with special Kickstarter only abilities and tools and full access to development builds + Wallpaper Sets + Sound Track (no DRM!)

Scroll Ninja for Desktop and scroll Ninja Pocket Edition *special* editions for Kickstarter complete with kickstarter only abilities and tools and full access to development builds + Wallpaper Sets + Sound Track (no DRM).

Premium Supporter.
Your name, a quote, and a link to your site in the credits as a Premium Supporter.
+
Scroll Ninja for Desktop and scroll Ninja Pocket Edition *special* editions for Kickstarter + every additional story pack we release. This is complete with kickstarter only abilities and tools and full access to development builds + Wallpaper Sets + Sound Track (no DRM).

Everything from the $50 level + a digital art book containing concept art, notes, scratch work, ideas etc. We'll also be including a repository of all our photos and video from our field trips (see update #1).
A USB Kunai [Ninja utility knife] filled with everything from the $75 level. The stick features the Scroll Ninja logo in English and Japanese printed on the side. Shipping will be billed separately.

A limited edition Scroll Ninja Fude [Japanese brush] Pen complete with logo and commemorative box + a pack of authentic Washi [Japanese Paper] like the backgrounds in the game. Everything from the $75 level is also included. Shipping will be billed separately.

You (or the person of your choosing) re-imagined as an animated background/NPC character in the game. This character will show up in the credits section with your name and a banner link to your site. You will receive all the rough sketches and any scratch work for your character as well.

You also get everything from the $75 level.
*We will not be able to create characters that infringe copyright or violate personal rights.

You design an enemy (it can be you!) to include in the game. This character will show up in the credits section with your name and a banner link to your site. You will receive all the rough sketches and any scratch work for your character as well.

You also get everything from the $75 level.
*We will not be able to create characters that infringe copyright or violate personal rights.

You get to design a boss that will be included in the game.This character and your details or the details of your choosing, including links and banners will be included in the credits. You will receive all the rough sketches and any scratch work for your character as well.

You also get everything from the $75 level.
*We will not be able to create characters that infringe copyright or violate personal rights.

You get to design a full stage for the game. This stage will be drawn out by hand on an authentic Japanese art scroll and sent to you. Your name and the details of your choosing will be included in the credits. You will receive all scratch files created while making your stage. You also get everything from the $75 level. Shipping will be billed separately. *We will not be able to create any stages or settings that violate copyright.

You or the character of your choosing as a playable character in the game. This character and your details or the details of your choosing, including links and banners will be included in the credits. You will receive all the rough sketches and any scratch work for your character as well.

You also get everything from the $75 level.
*We will not be able to create characters that infringe copyright or violate personal rights.

*Developer Special* Receive a license to all assets from the game (excluding stage scripts and storyline) and a non-GPL (closed source OK) license. You will be given access to assets immediately as we make them - so putting out your own Scroll Ninja remix or something else entirely using Scroll Ninja assets or code. After Kickstarter, if the campaign is successful, we will not be offering a deal like this. For more information please contact info@genshin.org directly.
